first.title: How can I pay for my order?
first.content: You can pay for your order using one of the following methods: online payment, PayPo, cash on delivery.

second.title: How long does it take to deliver my order?
second.content: The delivery time depends on the chosen method of delivery. The estimated delivery time is always given in the basket.

third.title: How can I return my order?
third.content: You can return your order within 14 days of receiving it. To do this, please contact our customer service.

fourth.title: How can I contact customer service?
fourth.content: You can contact our customer service by phone or email. You can find the contact details in the footer of the page.

fifth.title: How can I check the status of my order?
fifth.content: You can check the status of your order in the order history tab in your profile.

sixth.title: How can I cancel my order?
sixth.content: You can cancel your order in the order history tab in your profile.

first.title: How can I create a new post?
first.content: To create a new topic, go to chosen topic and click the new post button.

second.title: How can I reply to a post?
second.content: To reply to a post, go to the chosen post and click the reply button.

third.title: How can I edit my post?
third.content: To reply to a post, go to the chosen post and click the edit button.

fourth.title: How can I delete my post?
fourth.content: To delete your post, go to the chosen post and click the delete button.

first.title: How can I post comment to blog post?
first.content: To post comment to blog post, go to the chosen post and click the add comment button.

second.title: How can I create new blog post?
second.content: To create blog post first you must have blogger privileges. If you have them, go to the blog section and click the add new post button.

third.title: How can I find blog post?
third.content: To find blog post, go to the blog section and use search bar.

fourth.title: How go to specific section of blog?
fourth.content: To go to the specific section of blog, move your cursor to the blog option in navbar and choose section from the list.
